localised_text.tooltip_text: Nemesis Crown||View details about the Nemesis Crown and its effects.

dy_turns_to_fight.componentleveltooltip: Number of turns to win a battle before the Nemesis Crown is lost.||Defeat in battle will also cause the Crown to be lost.

property.name: condition
property.value: CurrentMouseOverComponentContext.Id != "nemesis_crown_tooltip_holder" && CurrentMouseOverComponentContext.Id != "button_nemesis_crown_toggle" && CurrentMouseOverComponentContext.Id != "button_info" && CurrentMouseOverComponentContext.Id != "radar_toggle" && CurrentMouseOverComponentContext.Id != "tab_events" && CurrentMouseOverComponentContext.Id != "tab_units" && CurrentMouseOverComponentContext.Id != "tab_regions" && CurrentMouseOverComponentContext.Id != "tab_factions"

warning_notification.comment: it is duplicating the text in the parent, but we need it as we are using 2 text shaders at the same time here: dropshadow on the parent and red on the child
